Uses of Interface
Support.mvc.IView

  • Packages that use IView 
    Package Description
    Hexxagon.View
    Classes and interfaces found in this package are designed to implement the view layer of Hexxagon module.
    Support.mvc
    Classes and interfaces found in this package are designed for creation of Model View Controller based applications.
    Support.navigator
    Classes and interfaces found in this package are designed to provide generalised implementations of pages and methodology of navigation.
    Window
    Classes and interfaces found in this package are designed to implement the pages and main functionalities of the application.

    • Uses of IView in Hexxagon.View

      Classes in Hexxagon.View that implement IView 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  FaceBoard
      Instance of this class realises an bulb face of game as a JavaFX specific graphical node.
      class  InfoBoard
      Instance of this class realises an info panel of game as a JavaFX specific graphical node.
      class  PlayBoard
      Instance of this class realises a virtual game board as a JavaFX specific graphical node.

    • Uses of IView in Support.mvc

      Classes in Support.mvc that implement IView 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  TView
      Generalised implementation of view component specified by IView interface.
      Fields in Support.mvc with type parameters of type IView 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private ArrayList<IView> TController.registeredViews
      Contains the added and attached view components.
      Methods in Support.mvc that return types with arguments of type IView 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ArrayList<IView> IController.getViewList()
      Returns a list of added view components.
      ArrayList<IView> TController.getViewList()
      Returns a list of added view components.
      Methods in Support.mvc with parameters of type IView 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void IController.addView(IView view)
      Attaches a view component to the class.
      void TController.addView(IView view)
      Attaches a view component to the class.
      void IController.removeView(IView view)
      It removes and detaches a view component from the controller.
      void TController.removeView(IView view)
      It removes and detaches a view component from the controller.

    • Uses of IView in Support.navigator

      Classes in Support.navigator that implement IView 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  TPage
      Contains generalised method implementations of page components specified by IPage interface.

    • Uses of IView in Window

      Classes in Window that implement IView 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  InfoPage 
      class  IntroPage
      Object instance of this class is responsible for the initialisation and draw of graphical component displayed on intro page.
      class  JFXPage
      Contains JavaFX specific implementations of TPage abstract class.
      class  PlayPage
      Object instance of this class is responsible for the initialisation and draw of graphical component displayed on play page.
      class  SettingsPage
      Object instance of this class is responsible for the initialisation and draw of graphical component displayed on settings page.
